meanings.definition: A type of headgear worn in India, typically made of cotton or silk and consisting of a long scarf wound around the head.
meanings.sent1: In the market, colorful puggries caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The man proudly wore his traditional puggries during the festival.
meanings.sent3: When the wind blew, the puggries danced on the heads of the people.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like puggries, wrapping around her mind in layers.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant puggries added a touch of elegance to the occasion.

meanings.sent1: The shop displayed various puggries for sale.
meanings.sent2: They collected different puggries from their travels.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with puggries of all colors, looking like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: His words were like puggries, twisting and turning in different directions.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were lined with puggries, creating a unique display.
